00023 /* function ViewStock ($p_cn)
00024  **************************************************
00025  * Purpose : show the listing of all goods 
00026  *        
00027  * parm : 
00028  *      - database connection
00029  * gen :
00030  *      -
00031  * return: string containing the table
00032  */
00033 function ViewStock($p_cn,$p_year) {
00034  // build sql -- get the different merchandise sold or bought
00035   // during the p_year
00036 $sql=" select distinct sg_code
00037       from stock_goods 
00038       join jrnx on (stock_goods.j_id=jrnx.j_id)
00039       join parm_periode on (parm_periode.p_id=jrnx.j_tech_per)
00040     where
00041       p_exercice= '$p_year'
00042       and sg_code is not null and sg_code != '' and sg_code!='null'";
00043 
00044 
00045   // send the sql
00046   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00047 
00048   
00049   if ( ( $M = pg_NumRows($Res)) == 0 ) return null;
00050   // store it in a HTLM table
00051   $result="<table>";
00052   $result.="<tr>";
00053   $result.='<th>Code</th>';
00054   $result.='<th>Noms</th>';
00055   $result.='<th>Entrée</th>';
00056   $result.='<th>Sortie</th>';
00057   $result.='<th>Solde</th>';
00058   $result.="</tr>";
00059 
00060   // Sql result => table
00061   for ($i = 0; $i < $M ; $i++ ) {
00062     $r=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00063     $result.="<TR>";
00064 
00065     // sg_code  and link to details
00066     $result.="<td>".'<a class="one" 
00067               HREF="stock.php?action=detail&sg_code='.$r['sg_code'].'&year='.$p_year.'">'. 
00068               $r['sg_code']."</A></td>";
00069 
00070     // name
00071     $a_name=getFicheNameCode($p_cn,$r['sg_code']);
00072     $name="";
00073     if ( $a_name != null ) {
00074       foreach ($a_name as $key=>$element) {
00075         $name.=$element['av_text'].",";
00076       }
00077     }// if ( $a_name
00078     $result.="<td> $name </td>";
00079 
00080     // Debit (in)
00081     $deb=GetQuantity($p_cn,$r['sg_code'],$p_year,'d');
00082     $result.="<td>".$deb."</td>";
00083 
00084     // Credit (out)
00085     $cred=GetQuantity($p_cn,$r['sg_code'],$p_year,'c');
00086     $result.="<td>".$cred."</td>";
00087 
00088 
00089     // diff
00090     $diff=$deb-$cred;
00091     $result.="<td>".$diff."</td>";
00092     $result.="</tr>";
00093 
00094   }
00095       $result.="</table>";
00096 
00097   return $result;
00098 }
00099 /* function  getFicheNameCode ($p_cn,$p_sg_code)
00100  ************************************************************
00101  * Purpose : return an array of f_id and f_name
00102  *        
00103  * parm : 
00104  *      - p_cn database connection
00105  *      - stock_goods.sg_code
00106  * gen :
00107  *      - none
00108  * return:
00109  *      - array (f_id, f_label) or null if nothing is found 
00110  */
00111 function getFicheNameCode ($p_cn,$p_sg_code) {
00112   // Sql stmt
00113 $sql="select distinct f_id,av_text
00114          from stock_goods
00115          join jnt_fic_att_value using (f_id )
00116          join attr_value using (jft_id)
00117          where 
00118           ad_id=".ATTR_DEF_NAME." 
00119           and sg_code='$p_sg_code'
00120            ";
00121 // Execute
00122  $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00123  if ( ( $M=pg_NumRows($Res)) == 0 ) return null;
00124  
00125  // Store in an array
00126  for ( $i=0; $i<$M;$i++) {
00127    $r=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00128    $a['f_id']=$r['f_id'];
00129    $a['av_text']=$r['av_text'];
00130    $result[$i]=$a;
00131 
00132  }
00133 
00134  return $result;
00135   
00136 }
00137 /* function ViewDetailStock($cn,$sg_code,$year)
00138  **************************************************
00139  * Purpose : 
00140  *        
00141  * parm : 
00142  *      - cn database connection

00145  * gen :
00146  *      -
00147  * return: HTML code
00148  */
00149 function ViewDetailStock($p_cn,$p_sg_code,$p_year) {
00150 $sql="select sg_code,
00151              j_montant,
00152              j_date,
00153              sg_quantity,
00154              sg_type,
00155              jr_comment,
00156              jr_internal,
00157              jr_id,
00158         case when sg_date is not null then sg_date else j_date end as stock_date
00159       from stock_goods
00160       left outer join jrnx using (j_id)
00161       left outer join jrn on jr_grpt_id=j_grpt
00162            where 
00163       sg_code='$p_sg_code' and (
00164           to_char(sg_date,'YYYY') = '$p_year'
00165        or to_char(j_date,'YYYY') = '$p_year'
00166        )
00167       order by stock_date
00168  " ;
00169 // $r.=sprintf('<input TYPE="button" onClick="modifyOperation(\'%s\',\'%s\')" value="%s">',
00170 //                  $row['jr_id'],$l_sessid,$row['jr_internal']);
00171     // name
00172 
00173 
00174   $r="";
00175   $a_name=getFicheNameCode($p_cn,$p_sg_code);
00176   $name="";
00177   if ( $a_name != null ) {
00178     foreach ($a_name as $key=>$element) {
00179       $name.=$element['av_text'].",";
00180     }
00181   }// if ( $a_name
00182   // Add java script for detail
00183   $r.=JS_VIEW_JRN_DETAIL;
00184 
00185  $r.='<H2 class="info">'.$p_sg_code."  Noms : ".$name.'</H2>';
00186   
00187   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00188   if ( ($M=pg_NumRows($Res)) == 0 ) return "no rows";
00189   $r.="<table>";
00190   $r.="<TR>";
00191   $r.="<th>Date </th>";
00192   $r.="<th>Entrée / Sortie </th>";
00193   $r.="<th></th>";
00194   $r.="<th>Description</th>";
00195   $r.="<th>Montant</th>";
00196   $r.="<th>Quantité</th>";
00197   $r.="<th>Prix/Cout Unitaire</th>";
00198   $r.="</TR>";
00199   // compute sessid
00200   $l_sessid=$_REQUEST['PHPSESSID'];
00201 
00202   for ( $i=0; $i < $M;$i++) {
00203     $l=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00204     $r.="<tR>";
00205 
00206     // date
00207     $r.="<TD>";
00208     $r.=$l['j_date'];
00209     $r.="</TD>";
00210 
00211     //type (deb = out cred=in)
00212     $r.="<TD>";
00213     $r.=($l['sg_type']=='c')?'OUT':'IN';
00214     $r.="</TD>";
00215 
00216     // jr_internal
00217     $r.="<TD>";
00218     $r.="</TD>";
00219 
00220 
00221     // comment
00222     $r.="<TD>";
00223     $r.=$l['jr_comment'];
00224     $r.="</TD>";
00225 
00226     //amount
00227     $r.="<TD>";
00228     $r.=$l['j_montant'];
00229     $r.="</TD>";
00230 
00231     //quantity
00232     $r.="<TD>";
00233     $r.=$l['sg_quantity'];
00234     $r.="</TD>";
00235 
00236     // Unit Price
00237     $r.="<TD>";
00238     $up=$l['j_montant']/$l['sg_quantity'];
00239     $r.=$up;
00240     $r.="</TD>";
00241 
00242     $r.="</TR>";
00243   }// for ($i
00244   $r.="</table>";
00245 
00246 
00247 
00248   return $r;
00249          
00250 }

00261 function ChangeStock($p_sg_code,$p_year){
00262 $sg_date=date("d.m.Y");
00263 $r='
00264 <input type="text" name="stock_change" value="0">
00265 <input type="hidden" name="sg_code" value="'.$p_sg_code.'">
00266 <input type="text" name="sg_date" value="'.$sg_date.'">
00267 <input type="hidden" name="year" value="'.$p_year.'">
00268 <br>
00269  ';
00270  return $r;

00273 /* function GetQuantity($p_cn,$p_sg_code,$year,$p_type 'd' or 'c'
00274  * purpose return the quantity of a sg_code for the period 
00275  *
00276  * Return number or NULL
00277  */ 
00278 function GetQuantity($p_cn,$p_sg_code,$p_year,$p_type) {
00279   $sql="select sum(sg_quantity) as result
00280         from stock_goods
00281       join jrnx on (stock_goods.j_id=jrnx.j_id)
00282       join parm_periode on (parm_periode.p_id=jrnx.j_tech_per)
00283         where
00284         sg_code='$p_sg_code' and 
00285          p_exercice = '$p_year' and 
00286          sg_type='$p_type'";
00287   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00288   if ( pg_NumRows($Res)== 0) return null;
00289   $value=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00290   return $value['result'];
00291     
00292 }
